doco_: Any key starting with 'doco_' is not a config value, it's documentation only.
doco_db: Everything with a 'db.' prefix is passed to sqlalchemy.engine_from_config
doco_updateSpecies: true/false, whether or not to add/update/delete species
doco_updateOccurrences: true/false, whether or not to add/update/delete occurrences
doco_logLevel: string, any level from the python logging module (i.e. DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL)
doco_maxRetrySeconds: The maximum number of seconds to keep retrying an ALA request, before finally canceling the import
doco_alaApiKey: >>>THIS IS SECRET. DO NOT MAKE THIS PUBLIC<<<. API key used to access sensitive occurrence coordinates in web requests to ALA
doco_alaVettingSyncUrl: The url to post vettings to. Used to sync local vettings with ALA.
